definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: All the Arsenal staff and everyone else have helped me.
sentences.chinese: 所有的阿森納工作人員和每一個其他人都在幫助我。

sentences.english: It was always going to be Arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 而且默特薩克想去的一直都只是阿森納。

sentences.english: Oxlade-Chamberlain - I can make a big impact Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain is confident he can make a big impact for Arsenal this season.
sentences.chinese: 張伯倫相信他可以在本賽季爲阿森納帶來大不同。

sentences.english: It was the Dutchman's first game since being manhandled by half the Arsenal team.
sentences.chinese: 這是他在被阿森納隊員侵犯後的第一場比賽。

sentences.english: I love to play in Rome and Barcelona and I think Arsenal has a nice stadium too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在羅馬和巴塞羅那比賽，阿森納的主場也很好。

sentences.english: The Arsenal manager wants to attack Villareal, playing to Arsenal's strengths of free-flowing attacking football.
sentences.chinese: 溫格想以阿森納流暢的進攻來攻擊比利亞雷爾。

sentences.english: The next month will be crucial for Arsenal, according to Arsène Wenger.
sentences.chinese: 阿森納主教練溫格表示12月對於球隊來說至關重要。

sentences.english: There appears to be a new force in that Woolwich Arsenal team.
sentences.chinese: 在阿森納出現了很多的新生力量。

sentences.english: There was talk of Patrick going to Arsenal over the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏季有傳言說帕特里克會去阿森納。

sentences.english: "I have thoroughly enjoyed my time at Arsenal, " Edelman said.
sentences.chinese: “我非常享受我在阿森納的時間，”埃德爾曼說。

sentences.english: Arsène Wenger still believes that Henri Lansbury has the ability to break through at Arsenal.
sentences.chinese: 溫格依然相信蘭斯伯裏有潛力成爲阿森納的一線球員。

sentences.english: "I think they can go to Arsenal full of confidence, " said Molby.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們做客阿森納帶着滿滿的自信。

sentences.english: Arsenal can today confirm the signing of midfielder Amaury Bischoff.
sentences.chinese: 阿森納可以證實，今天簽署了中場大將比肖夫。

sentences.english: Everyone at Arsenal Football Club wishes Kolo the best of luck for the future.
sentences.chinese: 阿森納的每一員都祝福圖雷未來一切順利。

sentences.english: Gilberto replied immediately and the visitors came close to an equaliser.
sentences.chinese: 吉爾博托馬上回敬一球，阿森納一度接近扳平比分。

sentences.english: Since then they have been known as Minho's Arsenalistas (Arsenal from Minho).
sentences.chinese: 從此他們被成爲米尼奧的阿森納。

definition: Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
